issue.title: [Gandiva] returning IR structs causes issues with windows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4209](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4209). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The decimal add fn return a struct (of high/low values). This is known to be fragile, due to abi compatibility issues. so, fixing this to switch to primitive types.
